00053 typedef struct
00054 {
00055   u32 CMP_Wakeup;
00056   u32 CMP_OutputSelection;
00057   u32 CMP_ScalerSource;
00058   u32 CMP_ScalerOutputBuf;
00059   u32 CMP_ScalerEnable;
00060   u32 CMP_CoutSync;
00061   u32 CMP_OutputPol;
00062   #if (LIBCFG_CMP_65x_VER)
00063   u32 CMP_InputSelection;
00064   #endif
00065   u32 CMP_InvInputSelection;
00066   u32 CMP_Hysteresis;
00067   u32 CMP_Speed;
00068 } CMP_InitTypeDef;
00069 
00070 #if (LIBCFG_CMP_CO)
00071 typedef enum
00072 {
00073   CMP_SYNCOUT_CMPnO       = 0,
00074   CMP_SYNCOUT_MCTM_CH0O   = 1,
00075   CMP_SYNCOUT_MCTM_CH0NO  = 2,
00076   CMP_SYNCOUT_MCTM_CH1O   = 3,
00077   CMP_SYNCOUT_MCTM_CH1NO  = 4,
00078   CMP_SYNCOUT_MCTM_CH2O   = 5,
00079   CMP_SYNCOUT_MCTM_CH2NO  = 6,
00080   CMP_SYNCOUT_MCTM_CH3O   = 7,
00081   CMP_SYNCOUT_MCTM_CH3OB  = 8,  // Inverted of MCTM_CH3O
00082 } CMP_SYNCOUT_Enum;
00083 #endif

00094 /* Definitions of CMP Protection Key                                                                        */
00095 #define CMP_PROTECT_KEY                           ((u32)0x9C3A0000)
00096 
00097 
00098 /* Definitions of CMP Output Status                                                                         */
00099 #define CMP_OUTPUT_HIGH                           ((u32)0x00008000)
00100 #define CMP_OUTPUT_LOW                            ((u32)0x00000000)
00101 
00102 
00103 /* Definitions of CMP Wakeup Control Bit                                                                    */
00104 #define CMP_WUP_ENABLE                            ((u32)0x00004000)
00105 #define CMP_WUP_DISABLE                           ((u32)0x00000000)
00106 
00107 #define IS_CMP_Wakeup_Set(x)                      ((x == CMP_WUP_ENABLE) || (x == CMP_WUP_DISABLE))
00108 
00109 
00110 /* Definitions of CMP Output Selection for IP Trigger Source                                                */
00111 #if (LIBCFG_CMP_65x_VER)
00112 #define CMP_TRIG_NONE                             ((u32)0x0 << 11)
00113 #define CMP_TRIG_GPTM_CH0                         ((u32)0x1 << 11) // CMP0
00114 #define CMP_TRIG_GPTM_CH1                         ((u32)0x1 << 11) // CMP1
00115 
00116 #define IS_CMP_OutputSelection2(x)                (0)
00117 #if (LIBCFG_CMP2)
00118 #define CMP_TRIG_GPTM_CH2                         ((u32)0x1 << 11) // CMP2
00119 #undef IS_CMP_OutputSelection2
00120 #define IS_CMP_OutputSelection2(x)                (x == CMP_TRIG_GPTM_CH2)
00121 #endif
00122 
00123 #define CMP_TRIG_GPTM_CH3                         ((u32)0x2 << 11)
00124 #define CMP_TRIG_SCTM                             ((u32)0x3 << 11)
00125 #define CMP_TRIG_MCTM_CH3                         ((u32)0x4 << 11)
00126 #define CMP_TRIG_MCTM_BK0                         ((u32)0x5 << 11)
00127 #define CMP_TRIG_MCTM_BK1                         ((u32)0x6 << 11)
00128 #define CMP_TRIG_ADC                              ((u32)0x7 << 11)
00129 
00130 #define IS_CMP_OutputSelection(x)                 ((x == CMP_TRIG_NONE)       || \
00131                                                    (x == CMP_TRIG_GPTM_CH0)   || \
00132                                                    (x == CMP_TRIG_GPTM_CH1)   || \
00133                                                    IS_CMP_OutputSelection2(x) || \
00134                                                    (x == CMP_TRIG_GPTM_CH3)   || \
00135                                                    (x == CMP_TRIG_SCTM)       || \
00136                                                    (x == CMP_TRIG_MCTM_CH3)   || \
00137                                                    (x == CMP_TRIG_MCTM_BK0)   || \
00138                                                    (x == CMP_TRIG_MCTM_BK1)   || \
00139                                                    (x == CMP_TRIG_ADC))
00140 #else
00141 #define CMP_TRIG_NONE                             ((u32)0x0 << 11)
00142 #define CMP_TRIG_GPTM_CH3                         ((u32)0x1 << 11)
00143 #if (LIBCFG_MCTM0)
00144 #define CMP_TRIG_MCTM_CH3                         ((u32)0x2 << 11)
00145 #define CMP_TRIG_MCTM_BK1                         ((u32)0x3 << 11)
00146 #endif
00147 #define CMP_TRIG_ADC                              ((u32)0x4 << 11)
00148 
00149 #if (LIBCFG_MCTM0)
00150 #define IS_CMP_OutSelMCTM(x)                      ((x == CMP_TRIG_MCTM_CH3) || (x == CMP_TRIG_MCTM_BK1))
00151 #else
00152 #define IS_CMP_OutSelMCTM(x)                      (0)
00153 #endif
00154 
00155 #define IS_CMP_OutputSelection(x)                 ((x == CMP_TRIG_NONE)     || \
00156                                                    (x == CMP_TRIG_GPTM_CH3) || \
00157                                                    IS_CMP_OutSelMCTM(x)     || \
00158                                                    (x == CMP_TRIG_ADC))
00159 #endif
00160 
00161 /* Definitions of CMP Scaler Source Selection                                                               */
00162 #define CMP_SCALER_SRC_VDDA                       ((u32)0x00000000)
00163 
00164 #if (LIBCFG_CMP_NOSCALER_SRC)
00165 #define IS_CMP_ScalerSource(x)                    ((x == CMP_SCALER_SRC_VDDA))
00166 #else
00167 #define CMP_SCALER_SRC_VREF                       ((u32)0x00000400)
00168 #define IS_CMP_ScalerSource(x)                    ((x == CMP_SCALER_SRC_VDDA) || (x == CMP_SCALER_SRC_VREF))
00169 #endif
00170 
00171 
00172 /* Definitions of CMP Scaler Output Enable Bit                                                              */
00173 #define CMP_SCALER_OBUF_DISABLE                   ((u32)0x00000000)
00174 #define CMP_SCALER_OBUF_ENABLE                    ((u32)0x00000200)
00175 
00176 #define IS_CMP_ScalerOutputBuf(x)                 ((x == CMP_SCALER_OBUF_DISABLE) || (x == CMP_SCALER_OBUF_ENABLE))
00177 
00178 
00179 /* Definitions of CMP Scaler Enable Bit                                                                     */
00180 #define CMP_SCALER_DISABLE                        ((u32)0x00000000)
00181 #define CMP_SCALER_ENABLE                         ((u32)0x00000100)
00182 
00183 #define IS_CMP_ScalerEnable(x)                    ((x == CMP_SCALER_DISABLE) || (x == CMP_SCALER_ENABLE))
00184 
00185 
00186 /* Definitions of CMP Sync Output Enable bit                                                                */
00187 #define CMP_ASYNC_OUTPUT                          ((u32)0x00000000)
00188 #define CMP_SYNC_OUTPUT                           ((u32)0x00000080)
00189 
00190 #define IS_CMP_CoutSynchronized(x)                ((x == CMP_ASYNC_OUTPUT) || (x == CMP_SYNC_OUTPUT))
00191 
00192 
00193 /* Definitions of CMP Output Polarity Selection                                                             */
00194 #define CMP_NONINV_OUTPUT                         ((u32)0x00000000)
00195 #define CMP_INV_OUTPUT                            ((u32)0x00000040)
00196 
00197 #define IS_CMP_OutputPol_Set(x)                   ((x == CMP_NONINV_OUTPUT) || (x == CMP_INV_OUTPUT))
00198 
00199 
00200 /* Definitions of CMP Inverted Input Source Selection                                                       */
00201 #if (LIBCFG_CMP_65x_VER)
00202 #if (LIBCFG_CMP_POS_INPUT_SEL_V2)
00203 #define CMP_INPUT_CMPnP                           ((u32)0x00000000)
00204 #define CMP_INPUT_CMPnP0                          ((u32)0x00000000)
00205 #define CMP_INPUT_CMPnP1                          ((u32)0x00000001)
00206 #define CMP_INPUT_CMPnP2                          ((u32)0x00000002)
00207 #define CMP_INPUT_OPA0O                           ((u32)0x00000003)
00208 
00209 #define IS_CMP_InputSelection(x)                  ((x == CMP_INPUT_CMPnP)  || \
00210                                                    (x == CMP_INPUT_CMPnP0) || \
00211                                                    (x == CMP_INPUT_CMPnP1) || \
00212                                                    (x == CMP_INPUT_CMPnP2) || \
00213                                                    (x == CMP_INPUT_OPA0O))
00214 #else
00215 #define CMP_INPUT_CMPnP                           ((u32)0x00000000)
00216 #define CMP_INPUT_OPA0O                           ((u32)0x00000001)
00217 #define CMP_INPUT_OPA1O                           ((u32)0x00000002)
00218 
00219 #define IS_CMP_InputSelection(x)                  ((x == CMP_INPUT_CMPnP) || (x == CMP_INPUT_OPA0O) || (x == CMP_INPUT_OPA1O))
00220 #endif
00221 #endif
00222 
00223 
00224 /* Definitions of CMP Inverted Input Source Selection                                                       */
00225 #define CMP_EXTERNAL_CN_IN                        ((u32)0x00000000)
00226 #define CMP_SCALER_CN_IN                          ((u32)0x00000010)
00227 
00228 #define IS_CMP_InvInSel2(x)                       (0)
00229 
00230 #if (LIBCFG_CMP_IVREF_CN_IN)
00231 #define CMP_IVREF_CN_IN                           ((u32)0x00000020)
00232 #undef  IS_CMP_InvInSel2
00233 #define IS_CMP_InvInSel2(x)                       ((x == CMP_IVREF_CN_IN))
00234 #endif
00235 
00236 #if defined(USE_HT32F65230_40)
00237 #define CMP_CMP0N_CN_IN                           ((u32)0x00000020)
00238 #undef  IS_CMP_InvInSel2
00239 #define IS_CMP_InvInSel2(x)                       ((x == CMP_CMP0N_CN_IN))
00240 #endif
00241 
00242 #if defined(USE_HT32F65232)
00243 #define CMP0_CMP1N_CN_IN                          ((u32)0x00000020)
00244 #define CMP1_CMP0N_CN_IN                          ((u32)0x00000020)
00245 #undef  IS_CMP_InvInSel2
00246 #define IS_CMP_InvInSel2(x)                       ((x == CMP0_CMP1N_CN_IN))
00247 #endif
00248 
00249 #define IS_CMP_InvInputSelection(x)               ((x == CMP_EXTERNAL_CN_IN) || (x == CMP_SCALER_CN_IN) || IS_CMP_InvInSel2(x))
00250 
00251 
00252 /* Definitions of CMP Hysteresis Level Selection                                                            */
00253 #define CMP_NO_HYSTERESIS                         ((u32)0x00000000)
00254 #define CMP_LOW_HYSTERESIS                        ((u32)0x00000004)
00255 #define CMP_MID_HYSTERESIS                        ((u32)0x00000008)
00256 #define CMP_HIGH_HYSTERESIS                       ((u32)0x0000000C)
00257 
00258 #define IS_CMP_Hysteresis_Set(x)                  ((x == CMP_NO_HYSTERESIS) || (x == CMP_LOW_HYSTERESIS) || (x == CMP_MID_HYSTERESIS) || \
00259                                                    (x == CMP_HIGH_HYSTERESIS))
00260 
00261 /* Definitions of CMP Speed Mode Selection                                                                  */
00262 #define CMP_HIGH_SPEED                            ((u32)0x00000002)
00263 #define CMP_LOW_SPEED                             ((u32)0x00000000)
00264 
00265 #define IS_CMP_Speed_Set(x)                       ((x == CMP_HIGH_SPEED) || (x == CMP_LOW_SPEED))
00266 
00267 
00268 /* Definitions of CMP Enable bit                                                                            */
00269 #define CMP_ENABLE                                ((u32)0x00000001)
00270 
00271 
00272 /* Definitions of CMP Output Edge Interrupt Enable bit                                                      */
00273 #define CMP_INT_RE                                ((u32)0x00000002)
00274 #define CMP_INT_FE                                ((u32)0x00000001)
00275 
00276 /* Check the CMP Interrupt Parameter                                                                        */
00277 #define IS_CMP_INT(x)                             ((x & 0xFFFFFF00) != 0x0)
00278 
00279 
00280 /* Definitions of CMP Output Edge Detection Enable bit                                                      */
00281 #define CMP_RE_Detect                             ((u32)0x00000200)
00282 #define CMP_FE_Detect                             ((u32)0x00000100)
00283 
00284 #define IS_CMP_EdgeDetect(x)                      ((x == CMP_RE_Detect) || (x == CMP_FE_Detect))
00285 
00286 
00287 /* Definitions of CMP Output Edge Flag                                                                      */
00288 #define CMP_FLAG_RE                               ((u32)0x00000002)
00289 #define CMP_FLAG_FE                               ((u32)0x00000001)
00290 
00291 /* Check the CMP flag Parameter                                                                             */
00292 #define IS_CMP_FLAG(x)                            ((x & 0xFFFFFF00) != 0x0)
00293 
00294 
00295 /* Check the CMPx Parameter                                                                                 */
00296 #if (LIBCFG_CMP2)
00297 #define IS_CMP2(x)                                (x == HT_CMP2)
00298 #else
00299 #define IS_CMP2(x)                                (0)
00300 #endif
00301 #define IS_CMP(x)                                 ((x == HT_CMP0) || (x == HT_CMP1) || IS_CMP2(x))
00302 
00303 
00304 /* Check the Scaler Value                                                                                   */
00305 #if (LIBCFG_CMP_SCALER_8BIT)
00306 #define IS_SCALER_VALUE(x)                        (x <= 0xFF)
00307 #else
00308 #define IS_SCALER_VALUE(x)                        (x <= 0x3F)
00309 #endif
00310 
00311 #if (LIBCFG_CMP_CO)
00312 #define  IS_CMP_SYNC_SOURCE(x)                    ((x == CMP_SYNCOUT_CMPnO)      || \
00313                                                    (x == CMP_SYNCOUT_MCTM_CH0O)  || \
00314                                                    (x == CMP_SYNCOUT_MCTM_CH0NO) || \
00315                                                    (x == CMP_SYNCOUT_MCTM_CH1O)  || \
00316                                                    (x == CMP_SYNCOUT_MCTM_CH1NO) || \
00317                                                    (x == CMP_SYNCOUT_MCTM_CH2O)  || \
00318                                                    (x == CMP_SYNCOUT_MCTM_CH2NO) || \
00319                                                    (x == CMP_SYNCOUT_MCTM_CH3O)  || \
00320                                                    (x == CMP_SYNCOUT_MCTM_CH3OB))
00321 #endif
